content: On FHIR-33559, FHIR-I voted to "Consider for future use", but the status is incorrectly stuck at "RESOLVED - CHANGE REQUIRED". How can I change the status to "DEFERRED"?
you need to sing and dance to the Jira gods. Be prepared to provide appropriate offering.

According to the history, @Mark Kramer, you changed the status from Deferred to "Resolved - Change Required" on Sept. 28. At the same time, you added the grouping "block-vote-0". The Jira gods demand to know how on earth you managed to do that, because it's not supposed to be allowed... :frowning:

I bet he used the "Adjust Grouping" workflow, which always sets the status to Resolved - Change Required.
image.png
Ah. That'd do it. Definitely need to get that bug fixed. @Mark Kramer, I'll see if I can use admin privileges to make it right.
Oh! I believe @Kevin Power is right! But changing the grouping should not have any side effects, should it?
Nope. Which is why I acknowledged it as a bug
Ok, bug fixed and I believe all impacted issues have been corrected. If you see further weirdness, please holler
